messages.title: The Issues That Matter Most
messages.content: Fighting for you against hard Brexit, Standing up for the NHS, Tackling the housing crisis

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fighting for you against hard Brexit
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Nearly 70% of Tower Hamlets voted Remain in the referendum. The Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought to keep Britain in, and we're determined to get you your say on the final Brexit deal.

Our health and care services need urgent investment. This issue won't go away, and we have a plan for progress. The Liberal Democrats will put an extra £6bn per year into health and social care, with a penny-on-the-pound income tax increase.
Liberal Democrats will build 300,000 badly needed new homes across the country per year, and support private renters by banning letting agent fees and taking action against rogue landlords.

issues.brexitEurope: The Conservatives are dragging us out of the Single Market. Nearly 70% of Tower Hamlets voted Remain in the referendum.
issues.economy: The Conservatives' hard Brexit will hit people in the pocket and hit the poorest families the hardest.
issues.health: Our health and care services need urgent investment. The Liberal Democrats will put an extra £6bn per year into health and social care, with a penny-on-the-pound income tax increase.
